term.title: periodic copolymer

item.text: A copolymer consisting of macromolecules comprising more than two species of monomeric units in regular sequence.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2287. 'Glossary of basic terms in polymer science (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2301 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122287)
